abilities.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following bonuses: 154/198/242/286/330 health and 0.7/0.9/1.1/1.3/1.5 health regeneration. 84/108/132/156/180 mana, 0.35/0.45/0.55/0.65/0.75 mana regeneration and 0.7/0.9/1.1/1.3/1.5 % magic resistance. 7/9/11/13/15 attack speed bonus and 1.17/1.5/1.83/2.17/2.5 main armor. 7/9/11/13/15 main attack damage to / / heroes and 14.7/18.9/23.1/27.3/31.5 main attack damage to heroes.
7/9/11/13/15 attack speed bonus and 1.17/1.5/1.83/2.17/2.5 main armor.
7/9/11/13/15 main attack damage to / / heroes and 14.7/18.9/23.1/27.3/31.5 main attack damage to heroes.
Dagon can be upgraded by purchasing the recipe again, up to 4 times.
Upgrading the item improves its stats and also Energy Burst.
The total gold cost for each level is 2850/4000/5150/6300/7450 .
name: Dagon
trivia: Dagon is the name of an ancient Mesopotamian god. Dagon's active ability, Energy Burst, may be a reference to the Bible's Samson where he prayed to the Abrahamic God for power to destroy his enemies at Dagon's Temple.
Dagon's active ability, Energy Burst, may be a reference to the Bible's Samson where he prayed to the Abrahamic God for power to destroy his enemies at Dagon's Temple.
Nyx Assassin's cosmetic item, Nyx Assassin's Dagon, is based on Dagon.
tips: Powerful against enemies who rely on high armor, damage block and evasion to survive.
Dagon can be used to put Linken's Sphere on cooldown, and make it's wielder open and vulnerable to other single-targeted disables.
Dagon's spell lifesteal can be combined with Radiance to rapidly heal yourself, which is very good as Radiance deals magical damage to enemies around it.
